Blog.post: Recently I have been telling Amanda and Theresa that I was moving this Saturday. Well.... Kevin couldn't lie to his girl I guess but once she found out I said not to tell Amanda. I thought I had convinced her but no, she told Amanda so there is no fun. They both think i'm mean but I think it's funny. Well thanks alot Theresa for ruining all my fun.

fenderST234: FINCH! SmarterChild: I know about Finch. I really like Finch. fenderST234: You like Finch?! SmarterChild: Yes. I really like Finch. Since we're talking about Finch... Tell me something else about it. fenderST234: Well Finch is very creepy. SmarterChild: Finch is very creepy? That's very interesting. What other band would you describe as very creepy? fenderST234: band? SmarterChild: Very creepy? Very interesting. Are there any other musical activities that you would describe as very creepy? fenderST234: musical activities?... SmarterChild : Eh. Whatever fenderST234... I was suprised to see that Smarterchild knew who Finch was. Although, I was very confused when he started talking about some band or musical activities.... Oh well, I am very happy that Finch has gone global being large, and creepy and all. Also see hosted.durp.net/finch to see Finch's fan site that is sweeping the nation ... er ... at least it was ... until Scribner brought it down at it's peak....
Compton made a comment to the FINCH convo and said Finch was an oaf. Well Compton you are right. Just thought i'd mention that to all the people who see this.
Compton is right! I do support DJ D. Squared's Fan Site urlLink http://dsquared.blogspot.com . I think the posts are funny and it is all the truth. I guess you could say I am a side blog to them.

Earlier this summer I had the one coversation with FINCH this whole summer. It was the week before 4th of July. Phone Rings Tony: Hello FINCH: Is Tony there? Tony: This is. FINCH: OH hey. I was just wondering is anyone doing anything for 4th of July? Tony: No..... FINCH: Okay I'll cya la.... (click) I hung up the phone That FINCH, thinking he can hang out. FINCH if you ever see this, I am sorry but you are a very large, and might I say creepy man.
Hey everyone.... Today I saw Anchorman... HILARIOUS...Everyone should go see that movie. I am seriously not kidding that is funny stuff.
Hi, My name is Tony Porter and this is my blog. This is dedicated to anything, if you want me to post something just tell me and I will post it. Thanks
I have seen DJ D. Squared's superfans' blog and I guess i am creating my own.
